import React, { useState } from 'react' import s from './categories.module.scss' import CategoriesCarousel from './CategoriesCarousel' export default function Categories() { const [filterCategory, setFilterCategory] = useState('escorts'); const activateBtn = e => { for (let btn of $('.category_control_btn')) { if ($(btn).not($(e.target)).hasClass('category_control_btn')) { $(btn).removeClass('active_btn_blue'); } } $(e.target).addClass('active_btn_blue'); } return (

SELECT A CATEGORY

ESCORTS TRANS BDSM TANTRA MASSAGE FETISH DANCERS

NEW ON THE SITE

) }
